data.comment: Today's referee, Erik Lambrechts, has blown to start the match.
Andrija Vukcevic (Waasland-Beveren) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 27, Gent have been awarded a penalty in Beveren...
Niklas Dorsch (Gent) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Gent take a 0-1 lead thanks to Niklas Dorsch.
In the minute 29, Aleksandar Vukotic (Waasland-Beveren) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Roman Yaremchuk extends Gent's lead to 0-2.
Vadis Odjidja with an assist there.
In the minute 30, Andreas Wiegel is booked for the home team.
Roman Yaremchuk puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
Great play from Milad Mohammadi to set up the goal.
In the minute 44, Great finish from Roman Yaremchuk to give Gent a 0-4 lead.
That's a fine assist from Vadis Odjidja.
The first-half has come to a close in Beveren.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Freethielstadion.
Nicky Hayen is making the team's first substitution at Freethielstadion with Joe Efford replacing Daan Heymans.
The home team have replaced Alessandro Albanese with Alexis Gamboa. This is the second substitution made today by Nicky Hayen.
In the minute 51, Danel Sinani strikes to reduce the deficit to 1-4 at Freethielstadion.
Alexis Gamboa for Waasland-Beveren has been booked by Erik Lambrechts and receives a first yellow card.
Gent make their first substitution with Matheo Parmentier replacing Vadis Odjidja.
In the minute 71, Aboubakary Koita is on a sub for Jur Schryvers for Waasland-Beveren.
Tim Kleindienst is replacing Anderson Niangbo for Gent at Freethielstadion.
Sven Kums is replacing Niklas Dorsch for the away team.
That's full-time at Freethielstadion. The final score is 1-4.
